name: KRIME
description:
This is a USC CTIN 484 student game made by Johan/Zhuohan Song and Gigi/Zhe Zhang in three months. 

Music/SFX: Jacob Jae Hyuk Jang

Two little kangaroos are caught by the police because the police think they are going to invade Uruguay! Help the little roos to escape and talk to the Uruguayans to prove they are friendly!

Help your kangaroo buddy to stay away from the police, or the consequence would be brutal..... But don't forget to enjoy the scenery in Australia and Santorini along the way~

Control: Player1: WASD and QEPlayer2: IJKL and UO
